    • addFollower

      public void addFollower(ManipMotor followerMotor, boolean isInverted)
      Sets the ManipMotor to follow another ManipMotor.
      Parameters:
      followerMotor - ManipMotor to follow the lead motor.
      isInverted - whether to invert the follower or not.
